description: This dashboard offers various perspectives (performance, run time and robustness) to compare different Actor architectures.

options.content: # Welcome to ASSUMES Actor Comparison Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  power
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Comparison of Total Run Times for each Simulation Run

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, 18) as scenario,
  SUBSTRING(ident, 20) as run,
  value 
FROM 
  kpis 
WHERE 
  variable = 'total_run_time'
ORDER BY 
  scenario, LENGTH(ident), run

SELECT
  scenario, 
  min(value),
  avg(value),  
  max(value)
FROM (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) as scenario,
    SUBSTRING(ident, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')) as run,
    value 
  FROM 
    kpis 
  WHERE 
    variable = 'total_run_time'
  ORDER BY 
    scenario, LENGTH(ident), run
  ) as subselect
GROUP BY 
  scenario

panels.title: Total Run Time

panels.description: How long takes one simulation episode?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 1"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND 
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02a_harder' AND  
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 1 (LF)"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND 
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02a_harder_LF' AND  
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 1 with LSTM"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02a_harder_lstm' AND 
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 1 with LSTM (LF)"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02a_harder_lstm_LF' AND 
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 2"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND 
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02b_harder' AND 
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

SELECT
  variable, 
  ident,
  value as "Case 2 with LSTM"
FROM 
  kpis
WHERE 
  variable = 'run_time' AND 
  SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) = 'example_02b_harder_lstm' AND 
  (CASE 
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN 1=1
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident !~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'evaluation' in ($sim_type_filter) AND 'learning' in ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' OR ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'exploration' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$'
    WHEN 'evaluation' IN ($sim_type_filter) THEN ident ~ 'eval'
    WHEN 'learning' IN ($sim_type_filter)  THEN ident !~ '[1-9]_[1-5]$' AND ident !~ 'eval'
  END)

panels.title: Run Time per Simulation Episode

panels.description: How many episodes were needed for training?

targets.rawSql:
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS tablefunc; 

SELECT 
  scenario, 
  min(episodes_done) as "min. episodes", 
  avg(episodes_done) as "avg. episodes", 
  max(episodes_done) as "max. episodes", 
  min(eval_episodes_done) as "min. eval episodes",
  avg(eval_episodes_done) as "avg. eval episodes",
  max(eval_episodes_done) as "max. eval episodes"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) as scenario, 
    SUBSTRING(ident, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')) as run, 
    episodes_done::NUMERIC, 
    eval_episodes_done::NUMERIC
  FROM crosstab( 
    'SELECT ident, variable, value 
    FROM kpis 
    WHERE variable = ''episodes_done'' OR variable = ''eval_episodes_done'' 
    ORDER BY ident, LENGTH(ident), variable',
    'VALUES(''episodes_done''), (''eval_episodes_done'')' 
    ) as ct (ident text, episodes_done text, eval_episodes_done text)
  ORDER BY scenario, LENGTH(ident), run) as subselect
GROUP BY scenario

CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS tablefunc; 

SELECT
  scenario
FROM (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTRING(ident, 1, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')-2) as scenario, 
    SUBSTRING(ident, regexp_instr(ident, 'run')) as run, 
    episodes_done, 
    eval_episodes_done 
  FROM crosstab( 
    'SELECT ident, variable, value 
    FROM kpis 
    WHERE variable = ''episodes_done'' OR variable = ''eval_episodes_done'' 
    ORDER BY ident, LENGTH(ident), variable', 
    'VALUES(''episodes_done''), (''eval_episodes_done'')' 
    ) as ct (ident text, episodes_done text, eval_episodes_done text)
  ORDER BY scenario, LENGTH(ident), run) as subselect
GROUP BY 
  scenario

panels.title: Number of Episodes

panels.description: How much profit make all learning units combined per evaluation episode? (Trained models in eval_episode 1 are mostly based on exploration runs and performing badly.)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  simulation,
  episode, 
  sum(profit)
FROM rl_params
WHERE simulation ~ '^${simulation}_eval_[1-9]+'  AND perform_evaluation is true 
GROUP BY simulation, episode
ORDER BY episode

panels.title: Total Evaluation Profit

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
SUBSTRING(m.simulation, 0, LENGTH(m.simulation) +1  - strpos(REVERSE(m.simulation),'_')) AS market_simulation
FROM rl_params m
where learning_mode is True and perform_evaluation is False
list.description: Can choose which simulation we want to show
list.name: simulation
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
SUBSTRING(m.simulation, 0, LENGTH(m.simulation) +1  - strpos(REVERSE(m.simulation),'_')) AS market_simulation
FROM rl_params m
where learning_mode is True and perform_evaluation is False

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT unit
FROM rl_params
where simulation ~ '^${simulation}_[1-9]+'
list.description: All units that have an reinforcment learning strategy and hence have the Rl specific parameteres logged
list.label: rl_unit
list.name: rl_unit
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT unit
FROM rl_params
where simulation ~ '^${simulation}_[1-9]+'
